typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		sr_no,
		employee_first_name,
		employee_last_name,
		age,
		school,
		college
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dupes
source2 aggregate(groupBy(employee_first_name)) ~> Grouping
